game.name: Far Far Away From Here
game.shortDescription: Very far away - Once upon a time in the same kingdom there lived a king .. No, he did not sit all his life on his throne, he was very fond of adventure and danger. Take over the reins of the rebellious king and show the goblins who's in charge!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Very far away - Once upon a time in the same kingdom there lived a king .. No, he did not sit all his life on his throne, he was very fond of adventure and danger. Take over the reins of the rebellious king and show the goblins who's in charge!
